## New input1:
```java
    int year1 = 2020;
    int half1 = 1;
    int half2 = 2;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because it represents a valid year (2020) and half-of-year (2).

## New input2:
```java
    int year1 = 2020;
    int half1 = 2;
    int half2 = 1;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because it represents a valid year (2020) and half-of-year (1).
